1.Text:
One winter day, Lambda is summoned by Alpha and
heads to her office...

Lady Alpha, I heard you wanted to talk... Is there a
problem?
Well, yes... If you can call it that...

(It's rare to see Lady Alpha so hesitant...
The situation must be quite bad.)

(...All the more reason to hear what she has to say.
That's my role...as one of the Numbers.)

Lady Alpha, please tell me anything. I promise to
accept whatever the situation is.

...Thank you. I feel you're the only one I can talk
to about this.
Listen. The thing is...

*sigh* It's the Valentine season... No wonder it
smells so sweet everywhere.

Says the one who's been eating chocolates. Aren't
those leftovers from Mitsugoshi? Did you secretly
take them...?

Managing stock is an important part of my job.
Ah, busy, busy.
Jeez, what a convenient excuse.
...Oh, look who's here already.
Oh, Nu. Did you finish your mission?

Yes, I just finished reporting. ...Omega.
Those chocolates you have...

I'm in the middle of stock disposal. We're helping
Mitsugoshi today.

I see... You must have been busy due to the
Valentine season, huh?

Yeah, absolutely. Lately, Valentine's Day has taken
hold among the aristocrats. Thanks to that,
Mitsugoshi's sales are sky-rocketing...
Even us Numbers are being pulled in as shop staff.

Sales are a source of funds for the Shadow Garden.
We can't neglect it.
All for the customers—a noble cause.

You say that sarcastically, but you seemed really
keen on listening to the customers' concerns.

That's...because Lady Gamma instructed us to be
courteous to the customers—

Oh, if it isn't Instructor Lambda. It's rare to see
you here.
*sigh*
You look pretty tired. Did something happen?
It's not something I can casually talk about.
Classified, huh?
No, it's not like that...

Then why not talk to someone about it? If it's
worrying you this much, it might be a problem
you can't solve alone.
Hmm... You may be right...

You're unusually hesitant. Since it's this time of
the year, is it about how to give chocolates or
something?
Hey, now isn't the time for joking around—
...Omega's right.
Huh?

L-Lambda, you have someone like that in your
life...?!

N-No, calm down... Maybe it's just chocolates for a
friend or something—
Even that would be a rarity... What is going on...?
Don't misunderstand me. It's not about me.
...It's about Lady Alpha.
...Lady Alpha?

Lady Alpha and chocolates...? I don't see the
connection.

I'll explain. This just happened a little while
ago...

The thing is, I'm having a hard time giving
chocolates to Shadow.
...Excuse me?

I want to personally convey my gratitude to him this
Valentine's Day.

But, considering all that he's given to me...regular
chocolates just won't suffice.

So...you wanted to talk to me about arranging for...
special chocolates?
Well...yes, but... It's not just that...

...Sorry. I haven't organized my thoughts
properly...

No, please don't worry. It's precisely because your
feelings for Master Shadow are so strong that you
are so distressed.

...Maybe that's it. I'm worried he'll be disappointed
that my feelings are inadequate...so I can't bring
myself to give him the chocolates.
...Lady Alpha. If I may be so bold.

...Anxiety comes in many forms. If you hold back and
hesitate, you will only grow more anxious.

Not giving them to him isn't an option, correct?
If so, you must resolve yourself to do it.

...You're right. I think I've become less and less
confident as I've hesitated.

Thank you for pushing me. I'll give the chocolates
to him while I still have the courage.

I offered as much advice as I could after that. But
I can't help wondering if there was more appropriate
advice I could have given her... The more time
passes, the more worried I get.

It's hard to believe someone as capable as Lady
Alpha is so worried...

How rare. She's usually so perfectly cool about
everything...

Lady Alpha said she would finally give the
chocolates to Master Shadow...today.

Knowing today's the day makes me even more
anxious... I really wonder if my advice was correct.
I still can't believe it.

Where will she do it? I'd like to see it with my own
eyes.

It doesn't sound like you're doing it just for fun.
Alright, let's observe Lady Alpha together in
secret.
The location is in the capital...

And so the four set off towards the capital, bathed
in the Valentine's Day atmosphere...

2.Text: *sigh*

...There she is. If we get too close, she'll sense
our presence. Let's observe the situation from
here.
Lady Alpha looks so nervous...

It's understandable since she's waiting for Master
Shadow. She's planning on giving him the chocolates
here.
(Lady Alpha... I hope it goes well...)
...Oh? It looks like Master Shadow has arrived.

We should just watch quietly. We mustn't disturb
them.
Oh, there you are. Sorry for keeping you waiting.
No, you're on time. I just got here early...

...Wait, Cid. That package you're holding, could it
be...?

Oh, this? It's Valentine's Day chocolates from
everyone in the Seven Shadows.
I see...

Everyone's really enthusiastic, aren't they?
Feels like they're enjoying Valentine's Day
to the fullest.

Beta even read me a letter before giving it to me,
although it was too poetic for my understanding.

Epsilon played the piano for me at a concert hall.
Gamma handed it to me at Mitsugoshi.

Anyway, the way everyone gave them to me was pretty
unique. Maybe events really are meant to be enjoyed
to the fullest.
...Y-Yes...right...

(The others gave chocolates to him in such
thoughtful ways. And here I am just handing
them over...)

(And I wasn't happy with anything handmade, so I
tried to make it up with store-bought luxury
chocolates from Mitsugoshi instead... I'm obviously
floundering.)

(I need to think more and put more effort into
it...)

So, what's up today? It's rare for you to want to
meet me like this.

Well... It seems like Tuna King added a limited-time
sandwich to their menu. Would you like to try it
together?

Ohh. I was curious about that as well. Wow, didn't
expect you to notice it, Alpha...
(...What am I even doing...?)
A few days later...

...No good. It's not velvety or creamy enough.
There's no way I can make him happy with this
chocolate...

Lady Alpha seems to be having a tough time. How many
days has it been already?

Three days. Ever since the day she couldn't give him
the chocolates, she's been holed up in the kitchen
whenever she's free.

Since she's so perfect at everything, her standards
must be incredibly high when she's dedicated to
something...

At this rate, she might fall ill... Maybe we should
speak to her—
What are you all doing?
L-Lady Alpha?!
...Did you notice we were here?
Yes, some minutes ago. So? What is it?
W-Well, the thing is...

...That's why I consulted with these three. I apologize
for taking such liberties without permission...
...I see. I made the four of you worry.
Please don't worry. But...

Lady Alpha. Please let us help with your chocolate
plan.
Um, Chi?!

Didn't you also see Lady Alpha's earnest efforts,
Omega? As her subordinate...no, as a fellow woman,
I can't stand back and do nothing.
Well...I can't say I don't understand what you mean.

I appreciate the offer, but...I can't ask that of you.
You all must be busy around this time, right?

True, we are busy...but it would be more detrimental
to the Garden for you to continue being troubled.

Well... But...why would you all go to such
lengths...?

Lady Alpha, you are always fully dedicated to
overseeing the Garden.

So, the least we can do is act on your behalf this
once.
Please, would you let us help?

...Actually, I knew this would happen. That if I
kept making chocolates alone, I would just
continue to flounder.
So...will you lend me your strength?
Yes! Leave it to us!

And so a Valentine's Day operation begins with Alpha
and the four Numbers...

3.Text:
Well then, let's get started. Welcome to this
special crash course on how to capture Master
Shadow's heart.

Right. We must convey Lady Alpha's feelings no
matter what...!
You all seem more enthusiastic than I am.

We start by making chocolates. Without a gift,
Valentine's Day has no meaning.

First, Lady Alpha, would you change into this,
please?
This is...quite the cute apron, isn't it?
...Wait. You want Lady Alpha to wear this?

Yes, it's cute and Valentine's Day-appropriate,
don't you think? Master Shadow will be pleased
if you gift him chocolates wearing this.
Hmm... But it's a bit too frilly...
In that case, Lambda, how about you also join in?

I see. If Lambda also wears it...Lady Alpha won't
stand out.
Wh-What...?! You want me to wear the same thing?!

I thought you'd say that, so I prepared a different
design for you.

No, clothes like this are not for me... Besides, it
would suit all of you so much better!

We're used to wearing various outfits for missions,
so it's not that embarrassing for us...but I guess
that's not the point.

It's about sharing the embarrassment to encourage
each other.
Alright, Lambda. Are you ready?
B-But what does Lady Alpha have to say—

...True, I'd like to see you in an outfit like this
as well, Lambda.
...I'll go change.

I've put it on... What do you think? Does it suit
me...?
Yes, it suits you well. Now, let's start cooking.
Lambda is surprisingly calm about all of this.

She's just pretending to be calm. If you observe her
closely, she's quite flustered—
Q-Quiet! Just get on with it already!
Heheh. Yelling in that outfit just makes you cuter.
Urk... Enough!

Lady Alpha, let's proceed without minding them.
First, we finely chop the chocolate and then temper
it.
Finely... About as thin as a thread?

Yes, that should be fine. We'll melt it in boiling
water, but the important part of tempering is the
temperature.

First, raise the temperature of the chocolate to 50
degrees to melt, then cool it to 27-29 degrees by
placing the bowl in water. Finally, heat it back to
32 degrees in the boiling water.

...I'm surprised. I knew Lambda was good at cooking,
but I didn't know she was knowledgeable about making
desserts as well.

An extension of her survival cooking skills,
maybe...?
That's quite the bizarre extension.

According to the recipe, the sugar for the ganache
inside should be...this much? Feels like a bit too
much, though.

Yes, it's slightly too much. Let's adjust it down to
the grain.
Okay. Lambda, tweezers, please.
Right, here.

What precise chocolate making... But failure isn't
an option when it comes to Lady Alpha and Lambda.

It's in their nature. Both are serious and
uncompromising.

We might be better off just rooting for them without
interfering...

It's done... It looks and tastes perfect. I'm sure
Shadow will like this chocolate...!

Well done, Lady Alpha. I'm glad I could be of some
assistance.
Hold on a moment. The next part is what's important.

The crucial task of handing the chocolate to Master
Shadow still remains.

Right... Since this is Shadow we're talking about,
I can't just hand it over to him...

We need a special way to deliver it to him...
Nu, any ideas?

What we need to make the receiver happy is...
something called the "element of surprise."
I see... What specifically do you have in mind?

First, summon him for some trivial matter and then
catch him off guard by handing him the chocolate.
That way—

He'll be delighted by the unexpected gift...
Let's put it into practice right away.

Thank you for joining me today, Cid. Sorry I called
you on such short notice...
I also had things to buy. Don't worry about it.

By the way, you're wearing an unusual outfit today.
It's pretty cute...
Y-You think...? Heheh...

Anyway, looks like the spring collections are
already out, even though winter seems far
from over.

(So far so good. He must think I'm here just to shop
for clothes...)

(Now I just need to give him the chocolate and make
the surprise a success. I'll cautiously wait for the
right timing...)
May I try on this dress?
Sure. Oh, should I hold your stuff?
Would you? Thank you...

No problem. Seems like you have something important
in here, so just to be safe.
...Huh?
Huh?

...Hold on. Does Master Shadow know about the
chocola—mfh?!
Quiet. Don't give us away.
...Why do you think that?

I felt a considerable amount of magic coming from
that bag. I thought maybe you were using slime to
protect something inside.
W-Well...

Master Shadow is impressive as always. He sees
through everything... A formidable individual.

But now that he's noticed something, the element of
surprise is gone.
*sigh* Back to the drawing board then...

4.Text:
Nu's strategy was unsuccessful... Next, I'll offer
my advice.

I'm counting on you, Omega. Looks like surprises
won't work. What's your strategy?
Well... This time, let's push for the vibe.

Giving chocolates in a romantic setting will
definitely make it feel special. For instance...

Mmm, delicious! The seasoning is subtle but
perfect...I think!

I'm glad it suits your taste. This restaurant is a
favorite of mine.

But are you sure it's okay? Treating me to such a
fancy place...
Don't worry about it. You're special.

Yeah? I don't quite get it, but I'll take your word
for it.
Heheh. Feel free to order anything.

(A delicious meal and a pleasant atmosphere...
Everything's set. Now it's all up to me...)

With food this good, I'm looking forward to dessert.
Can I order some?

Before that...Cid. There's something I want to give
you...

…Say no more. I've memorized all the details
of the plan.
...Huh?
Find the rat hidden among us...right?
...You're perceptive, aren't you?

(A rat... Someone from the Cult is here. Now's not
the time for chocolates...)
I'll just go freshen up my makeup.
Alright.

Alpha treating me to such a fancy restaurant...
That can only mean...

She's going all out with this shadowbroker stuff...
Man, she's a good sport.

Who would've thought there'd be someone from the
Cult among the guests? Luckily, we caught them,
but...
*sigh* Another failure...
Heh... Now it's my turn.
Oh? You seem pretty confident.

Yes, there's no way this will fail. After all, all
you need to do is act... Something you already
do during regular missions.

You just need to create a mood not influenced by
your surroundings, but by you.
I see. For Lady Alpha, that should be quite easy.

That would be a better way to deal with unforeseen
circumstances.

Lure him out into the night with sweet words and
give him chocolate under the moonlight... I think
it's a good plan.
Sweet words, huh... What should I say...?

"I don't want to go home yet..." How about that? A
wistful expression and an upward gaze are essential.

Maybe something more direct would be better. "This
is a token of my feelings!" or something like that.
Are you seriously telling Lady Alpha to do that?!

It's fine, Lambda. I understand the importance of
acting. They're not wrong.

Alright, let's give it a try. Picture Master Shadow
is right in front of you and speak.
Shadow... Okay, I'll try.
I don't...want to go...home yet...!
...Huh?
Th-This is a token...of my feelings...!
That was...vocal practice, wasn't it? My apologies.

No, I was saying it for real... I imagined him right
in front of me.

You act so effortlessly during missions, but it's so
different when you're in front of Master Shadow...!
Chi! Mind your words!

But this might be a bit challenging. If a trainee
acted like this, imagine what kind of harsh words
Lambda would have for her.
Agh...! W-Well...!
Was it really that bad...?
...What's important is to keep practicing.
Right. It's all to make him happy...

Alpha asked to meet me the day after she treated me
to a meal. And she's uncharacteristically late...
...I see. So that's what this is...
I'm sorry, Cid. Did I keep you waiting?
T-Today, um...I don't want to go home...!
...I thought as much.
I want to convey my feelings to you...!
No need to say more. I understand everything.
Huh? What do you mean...?

(I'm sure Alpha's motivation for her "shadowbroker"
play is peaking just about now!)

(Her tardiness today is probably her practicing the
"hero arrives late" trope. It's a standard move,
but it takes on a special meaning when Alpha does
it. In that case...)
Tonight, I'll accompany you wherever you go.
R-Right! Of course!

*sigh* Who knew there was a Cult base in a place
like this...

Following Master Shadow, overlooking the city,
identifying the base...

Impressive... It's as if Master Shadow is guiding us
to the right answers.
Yes, he really is special. But—
The mission itself failed...

Lady Alpha. Please leave the rest to us and get some
rest.

...Thank you. I'll take you up on that. I'm quite
exhausted today...
Lady Alpha...
...How can I dispel her worries...?

5.Text:
*sigh* What should I do? Nothing seems to be going
right...
N-Next...is...Omega, any ideas?
Don't ask me. I can't think of anything right now.

...Maybe trying to give him chocolates is annoying
him. He could be warning me not to get too carried
away...
No. That can't be the case. It can't, but...
We can't possibly fathom what he's thinking...

...If I may be so bold, Lady Alpha, do you intend to
give up just like that?

Lady Alpha, I told you to do what you desire.
Of course, I will spare no effort in helping you.

But...is your true desire really just to not
disappoint or trouble him?
Please tell us what you truly desire.
...What I desire is...

To express my gratitude to Cid... The debt I owe him
is beyond words, but I hope to repay at least a small
portion of it.

Heheh... I feel ashamed of nearly losing sight of my
own feelings.
So, what do you intend to do next?

I'll keep trying until I can give them to him. After
the help I've received from all of you, I can't just
give up now...!
Understood. In that case...
It seems the time has come to use this notebook!

I-Isn't that...?! Lambda, you're really going for
it...!

What do you mean? What's so special about that
notebook?

It's a notebook on training soldiers. Inside, there
are training methods, physical conditioning, and
even tactics for breaking an individual's spirit.
It's a terrifying item, but—

Normally, it's not something that would ever be used
on Lady Alpha. Lambda, you're fearless.

Normally, yes. But this is a special edition
tailored to Lady Alpha.

Lady Alpha. I've been researching successful
Valentine's Day strategies since hearing your
concerns. I'll put you through a special training
program based on my research.

It's going to be a rigorous regimen...but if you're
prepared to take on the challenge, I, Lambda, will
support you every step of the way!
...I'm prepared.

I'm now just a nameless recruit... Please train me,
Instructor Lambda.
Understood...I mean, fine!

We'll conduct special training at the outdoor
training center! Follow me, and no dawdling!
...They're both quite fired up, aren't they?
Maybe what we were lacking was that intensity.
Well, uh...I guess we'll just observe quietly.

If you survive this special training, you'll be able
to fulfill your true Valentine's Day desires.

But until then, you are the lowest of all creatures!
Understand?!
Ma'am, yes ma'am!
Louder!
Ma'am, yes ma'am!

Whether you win or lose on Valentine's Day all
depends on you! If you don't want to end up a
cowardly chicken, make up your mind! Say it!
Ma'am, yes ma'am!
Hmph, good enough. Impressive by your standards.

Strong convictions reside in a strong body.
Grab those weights and start doing squats!
Ma'am, yes ma'am!

Good! Now shout out your feelings for Master Shadow!
How do you feel toward him?!
Grateful!
I can't hear you. How do you feel?!
Grateful!
How do you feel?!
Grateful!

Lambda's completely in the zone, isn't she?
And taking on Lady Alpha no less...

Lambda can transform into a demon for Lady Alpha's
sake. There's something to learn from that level of
commitment.
Why am I actually impressed...?
Please accept my handmade chocolates!

Don't look away! Look at the person you're giving
the chocolate to!
Please accept my homemade chocolates!

Pathetic! What're you, a piece of chocolate? Is a
piece of chocolate going to hand out chocolate?!
Ridiculous!
Ack... Ma'am, no ma'am!!

Frustrated? Then channel that frustration into this
training! Press your arms against your body, use
your upturned eyes!

Simulating the act of giving the chocolates, huh? If
Lady Alpha gives them with that expression and pose,
even the mighty Master Shadow will surely—!
Yes, surely he will accept them...!
...Is Valentine's Day supposed to be like this...?

6.Text:
You've finally got the right look. That marks the
conclusion of all the special training!

...Lady Alpha, well done. I apologize for the many
indignities...even if it was for the sake of training.

No, I appreciate it. Thanks to you, I can now stand
before him with confidence.

Lady Alpha. I've arranged for Master Shadow to come
to Alexandria.

I've tightened the security outside the room to
ensure there are no disturbances. Rest assured,
we won't eavesdrop, so please don't worry.

That's about all we can do. We wish you the best of
luck this time around!

All of you...thank you for everything. I'm
determined to see this through, to honor
your efforts as well.
Yes, I promise...!
Both Master Shadow and Lady Alpha have entered.

Now we just have to guard this place. I'm a little
curious about what's happening inside, though.

She'll give him the chocolates once they're alone...
That's the meat and potatoes of this plan. Hopefully,
Master Shadow will—
Boss man is eating meat and potatoes?

No, not literally, we were just talking about
the plan—
...Huh?! Whose voice was that...?

I wanna eat meat and potatoes with Boss man too!
I'm so hungry!
(...This is bad.)

If Lady Delta enters now, the entire plan will be
ruined!
But we can't match her strength...

We need to somehow convince her to leave
peacefully...!

How're we supposed to do that? She's not exactly
someone who listens to reason...

*sniff sniff* I don't smell meat and potatoes. But I
do smell Lady Alpha. Is she with Boss man?

...Yes. Lady Alpha is inside. They are having an
important discussion, so I must regretfully ask
that you return at a later time.
Huh?! Did Lady Alpha say I can't enter?
W-Well...

Technically, Lady Alpha didn't order us to not let
anyone enter.

She may not have explicitly ordered it, but...after
all the support we've given, we can't let her down
at the very last moment...!
If it's not a "no," then it's a "yes"!

P-Please wait! I apologize, but this time, I cannot
permit it, even if it's you, Lady Delta!
You're going to stand in my way?

Yes, I will not allow anyone to pass. This is not
just a matter of duty...but my own will!
Alright... Let's play!
Urk...! Lady Delta's aura has changed...!

But we can't back down now... Looks like we have no
choice but to fight.

If the four of us work together, we might be able to
buy some time. Let's hope things go well inside in
the meantime.

Are you all really serious? Taking on one of the
Seven Shadows, especially one who specializes in
combat, do you realize how crazy that sounds?
But we're doing it, right?

Hahah. Totally. Looks like we've all been caught up
in the Valentine's Day spirit.
...Here she comes! Get ready to intercept!

Thank you for coming today. I bet you were surprised
for me to ask you here out of the blue?

I'm kind of used to it. You've been asking me to
meet you a lot lately.
R-Right... So, um, today...
(Why...? Why am I struggling to speak properly...?)

(All that special training will go to waste if I
don't give him the chocolates in the perfect
way...!)
Cid. I have something for you—
...Isn't it kinda noisy outside?
Huh? Now that you mention it—
Aagh...?!
La-Lambda?!

The door just flew open. You all look beat up...
What's going on?
Agh... She's too strong...!
*huff, huff* So much for buying time...
A-All of you...!

I'm sorry, Lady Alpha... We were no match for
Lady Delta...
Hehe! What weaklings!
Delta, you're here too... What in the world...?

Hey, Lady Alpha! Are you hogging Boss man all to
yourself? That's not fair!

(I'm not sure what's happening, but I can't just
stand by and let Delta do this...)
Everyone, step back.

I-I can still fight! As an instructor, I must see it
through to the end...!
Lambda... Alright. Let's stop Delta together!
...Uh, what's going on here?

7.Text: Ulp... Lady Alpha really is strong...

Looks like you've calmed down. Make sure to arrange
to repair the door you broke.
Yes, ma'am...
Seriously...

(The situation and mood are completely off... The
atmosphere just isn't right for giving chocolates
now...)
Lady Alpha! Now's your chance!
Huh?

If you've resolved yourself to giving them to him,
then you must follow through to the end!
Lambda... Alright.
Ci...Cid!
Huh? Yeah, what?
I prepared chocolates for you. Will you accept them?
For me? Wait, did you make them yourself?

Yes. They're made with my gratitude. I may not be
able to repay everything you've done for me, but...

(This situation is far from romantic, and I haven't
managed to do what I trained for. He might be
disappointed, but...)
(I have to convey my feelings...!)
Oh, thanks. I really appreciate it.
Really...appreciate it? Honestly...?

Yeah, honestly. "Gratitude" sounds a bit over the
top, but since you made it yourself, I'm sure they're
delicious.

(He's genuinely happy... It's like he's accepting me
just as I am...)
I'm happy to hear that...truly.
Ulp... Was I maybe not supposed to be here...?

Breaking into places and taking out your allies is
never commendable.
S-Sorry...

But, thanks to you, Delta, I've come to realize the
importance of expressing my emotions honestly.
So, thank you.

...Huh? A pat on the head? Even though I was just
scolded?

Right, all's well that ends well. Not that I really
understand what just happened.

By the way, is it okay for me to eat this chocolate
now? Can I open it?

Of course. But it might have been crushed during the
fight just now...
Nah, I think it's fine. Look—
Whew, it's okay...! It held together.
Yes. It's as perfect as when it was made.

By the way, Lady Delta, you wanted to eat meat and
potatoes, didn't you? Lambda can make some for
you just right over there.
...Heheh. I see where this is going.

Lambda is quite a good cook, you know. Why not try
some?
Meat and potatoes! I wanna eat some!

Right. Then, please come this way.
...You too, Lambda.
What are you three suddenly on about—
...Ah, right. Back to the original plan, huh.

Well then, Master Shadow, Lady Alpha, we'll take our
leave.
She wanted to eat meat and potatoes that badly?
It seems so. Well then, shall we eat the chocolates?

Yes, let's eat... Mmm! Delicious! It's so creamy
with just the right sweetness!

They're fancier than store-bought ones. As expected,
Alpha, even your chocolate-making skills are
impeccable.

Heheh... Hearing that from you makes the effort I
put into making them completely worthwhile.
...Hey, Cid, are they really delicious?
Yes, delicious... Wait, didn't I just say that?
Heheh. Maybe. I like hearing it again.

I ended up spending quite a bit of time with Alpha.
Hmm, the quality of those chocolates... I wonder if
they could be commercialized.

That said, it seems no one noticed. Alpha seemed
happy as well, so that's a relief.

The moment Delta charged, I secretly protected the
chocolate with a slime barrier! It's one of my
secret techniques—"Seriously Hard Coating"!

(And to think, the chocolate I protected was for me.
Well, I'll make it up to her gradually over time.)

After all, I want to continue playing these
shadowbroker games with Alpha!

Nodding with a content expression, he mutters
slightly bizarre things as he vanishes into the
darkness of the night...
